results.name: A130296 * A000012.
reference: H. S. M. Coxeter, Regular Polytopes, 3rd ed., Dover, NY, 1973, pp 159-162
formula: A130296 * A000012 as infinite lower triangular matrices. (1,3,5,...) as the left border; (1,2,3,...) in all other columns.
xref: Cf. A130296, A000012, A034856 (row sums), A130302 (commuted matrix product)
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, May 20 2007
ext: Additional comments from _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, Mar 28 2009
